hackathon-description-text: Northumbrian Water are currently seeking to evidence the potential of investing in a new customer facing insight tools. We are organising an exciting 2-day initiative to bring together data analysts and expression specialists, software developers, and entrepreneurs to demonstrate the potential value of the investment in creating new solutions to improve the quality of insight provided to non-household customers and specifically considering the needs of local authorities and government.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Usefulness in identifying and tracking potential water energy savings
Smart approaches to integrating available data from local authority, utility and other sources
Beyond operational benefits, the potential to help the local authority save money
Consideration given to data expression and reporting system integration
